column4: when i open desktop,documents.downloads etc under places suddenly vlc opens i restarted my system but also it dosnot works,please help me?
when i open desktop,documents.downloads etc under places suddenly vlc opens i restarted my system but also it dosnot works,please help me?
i have the solution for you. :) thats happening becuase of the default file association problem
there is a file in the home folder which lists the default file association. i dont remember the exact file, i am searching for it. just 2 minutes
here is your solution. chech whether this file exist in your machine. ~/.local/share/applications/mimeapps.list
